column1: the present invention provides a method for plasma dicing a substrate. the method comprising providing a process chamber having a wall
column2: providing a plasma source adjacent to the wall of the process chamber
column3: providing a work piece support within the process chamber
column4: placing the substrate onto a support film on a frame to form a work piece work piece
column5: loading the work piece onto the work piece support
column6: providing a cover ring disposed above the work piece
column7: generating a plasma through the plasma source
column8: and etching the work piece through the generated plasma.
